metaproplugin.name: Metapro Plugin
metaproplugin.description: Metapro Plugin addon for Web3 connection, user management, and leaderboard integration.

users-service-api-url.name: Users Service API URL
users-service-api-url.desc: The URL of the Users Service API used by the Metapro system.

project-id.name: Project ID
project-id.desc: The unique identifier for your project in Metapro.

referral-settings-id.name: Referral Settings ID
referral-settings-id.desc: The ID for the referral settings configured in your project.

leaderboard-id.name: Leaderboard ID
leaderboard-id.desc: The ID of the leaderboard used in the Metapro system.

leaderboard-api-key.name: Leaderboard API Key
leaderboard-api-key.desc: The API key required to access the leaderboard.

leaderboard-api-url.name: Leaderboard API URL
leaderboard-api-url.desc: The URL of the Leaderboard API used in the Metapro system.

on-account-received.description: Triggered when the user's Ethereum account is successfully retrieved.

on-user-logged-in.display-text: When a user is logged in
on-user-logged-in.description: Triggered when the user is successfully logged in.

on-leaderboard-received.description: Triggered when leaderboard data is successfully retrieved.

on-error.description: Triggered when an error occurs during any plugin operation.

request-account.description: Requests the user's Ethereum account from the connected wallet.

login.display-text: Login user with referral code {0} and rules checked {1}
login.description: Logs in the user using their Ethereum account. Optionally includes a referral code and checks if rules are accepted.

referral-code.name: Referral Code
referral-code.desc: The referral code provided by the user, if any.

rules-checked.name: Rules Checked
rules-checked.desc: Indicates whether the user has accepted the rules.

request-leaderboard.display-text: Request leaderboard with limit {0}, minimum balance {1} and maximum balance {2}
request-leaderboard.description: Requests leaderboard data for a specific level and score range with a defined limit.

limit.name: Limit
limit.desc: The maximum number of leaderboard entries to retrieve.

score.name: Score
score.desc: The score value to be updated for the user.

get-last-error.description: Get the most recent error message encountered by the plugin.

get-account.description: Get the current user's Ethereum account.

get-access-token.description: Get the user's Web3 access token.
